BIO

My name is Ratko Kovačević. I am working as a freelancer. I have a bachelor’s degree in IT. The love to work with computers software or hardware is there since i am 6 year old. I design in the browser with HTML(5), CSS(3), JavaScript/jQuery, Bootstrap, Vue.js, Gulp and many more frameworks and technologies. Want to work together? I’d love to hear from you.
